item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 9, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI: Sora (225 points | 161 comments)
2. New dog, old trick: DaMAgeCard attack targets memory directly via SD card reader (11 points | discuss)
3. Show HN: I used ChatGPT and Blender to combine 150 WW2 movies chronologically (22 points | 3 comments)
4. Himalaya: CLI to Manage Emails (192 points | 66 comments)
5. The Theory and Technique of Electronic Music (2006) (139 points | 34 comments)
6. Task-Specific LLM Evals That Do and Don't Work (64 points | 22 comments)
7. Kafka's Screwball Tragedy: Investigations of a Philosophical Dog (53 points | 5 comments)
8. What you need to know about SQLite (4 points | 1 comment)
9. Compromising OpenWrt Supply Chain (474 points | 74 comments)
10. Knight TV Resurrection (2018) (11 points | 2 comments)
11. Willow, Our Quantum Chip (221 points | 163 comments)
12. Noise Filtering Using €1 Filter (2020) (62 points | 24 comments)
13. MagiskSSH – SSH server on Android without Termux (74 points | 36 comments)
14. Starlark Programming Language (83 points | 72 comments)
15. A simple way to scale pixel art games (35 points | 9 comments)
16. True Crime: Allan Pinkerton's Thirty Years a Detective (1884) (34 points | discuss)
17. Laylo (YC S20) Is Hiring an Account Manager in EU/UK ( | hide)
18. A liar who always lies says "All my hats are green." (74 points | 261 comments)
19. Mise: Dev tools, env vars, task runner (386 points | 173 comments)
20. Efficient Track Anything (130 points | 11 comments)
21. How to Reverse Engineer a 12 EUR Intel PCIe FPGA Card IBM 98Y2610 (68 points | 24 comments)
22. 1,600 days of a failed hobby data science project (133 points | 58 comments)
23. Debugging a Superblock Percpu_rw_semaphore Deadlock (31 points | discuss)
24. How much do I need to change my face to avoid facial recognition? (233 points | 217 comments)
25. "Hetzner decided to cancel our account and terminate all servers" (221 points | 131 comments)
26. Show HN: A portable hash map in C (152 points | 72 comments)
27. 2M MPH galaxy smash-up seen in unprecedented detail (58 points | 21 comments)
28. CT Scans of New vs. Used SawStop (150 points | 172 comments)
29. Chuck E. Cheese's animatronics band bows out (190 points | 130 comments)
30. Itch.io Taken Down by Funko (953 points | 392 comments)
